title: Gel Manicure and Nail Artistry
headline: This free online course will explore the anatomy of the nail and explores manicures, pedicures and nail artistry.
description: Do you love painting your nails and want to know how to care for them properly? This course will introduce you to the anatomy and physiology of the nail. You will analyse nail products and acrylic and gel nail techniques for manicures and pedicures. We illustrate how to make stunning nail art with various designs for you to attempt, from simple to advanced. After that, you will examine the different aspects of starting a salon business.
courseDescription:
Our hands are one of the first things people notice about us because we use them daily. Neatly done nails not only amp up your look but keep your nails healthy and strong while they complement your outfit. In today's world, we consider well-kept nails to be an important part of a professional image. As a result, it has become a natural canvas for expressing creative imagination. Whether it's for a wedding, a red carpet event or a fashion show, nail technicians who create nail art are in high demand. Do you love painting nails with different colours or creating intricate designs? Would you like to be a part of the billion-dollar beauty industry? This course introduces you to the concept of nail art, its techniques and tools. In addition, you will learn about nail anatomy, disorders and diseases and their signs and symptoms.

Next, we will help you understand how to care for your nails. You will gain knowledge of the fundamentals of plain, French or gel manicures and pedicures and how to set up your work environment hygienically. We will also teach you how to shape the nails for the best results, shine them, remove old nail polish without harming the nail plate and more. Gel nails and nail art have gained popularity both on the runway and in everyday life. Explore what makes gel nails so popular and why a base coat is vital for nail art. A nail art specialist uses various products like beads, flower petals, glitter, lace and acrylic enhancements while creating art. We'll show you how to make unique designs from dotting and stripping to textured look, line art and more. Then all you have to do is practice them and create your own art.

Do you wish to start your own salon business? We will show you the most effective way to establish a salon. Discover tips on decoration, marketing, salon management and customer relations. Explore the legal aspects of starting a salon, including employment laws and benefits, business operations and more. Becoming a nail technician is a great career opportunity for anyone creative and hardworking. This course is an excellent starting point for those who have a passion for beauty and wish to learn new skills. If you are already in the beauty industry and want to expand your career in nail artistry, be an entrepreneur or accentuate your skills for personal use, this is the perfect course for you. So why wait? Enrol now and equip yourself with the essential knowledge and talents to express your creativity.

Start Course Now

Your Alison is:

  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:

  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs.
